Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
CollisionDetection2 Collision Detection class Check the player have a collision with an object
DPosition Class Double Position take the position as type double
GameWindow Class for the Main game window
HUD The HUD class creates a heads up display that shows the player's health level.
Line Class Line including the position of start point and end point of a line the collection of line will create the wall to limit the player
MapLoader  
Orbit Main game class
Player Player Class: contains all the game mechanics for the orb object, including its thrusters.
Position Position class 2 parameter, x-position and y-position
Sound Implements the playing and stopping of sounds
Star The Star class creates stars that can be collected.
